Quackbot.info
Enum Hooks

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Hooks>
      Quackbot.info.Hooks
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Hooks>
public enum Hooks
extends Enum<Hooks>

Enum of all avalible hook types. Hook types are named from PircBot methods

public static Hooks valueOf(String name)
